value.title: Nvidia is looking to expand its silicon empire as it rides the AI boom - the chipmaker is in discussions for a stake in the UK's Arm
value.excerpt: Nvidia is in discussions to acquire a stake in UK-based chip designer Arm before it goes public. The world's top chipmaker previously tried to acquire the same firm in 2020 – before US competition authorities blocked the move.
